answer: <p>I found another problem causing this issue and already solved it. I accidentally saved my script in <code>UTF-16</code> encoding. It seems that PHP5 can't recognize <code>&lt;?php</code> tag in 16 bit encoding by default.</p>

<p>I've solved this by uninstalling XAMPP, and installing WAMP.
Thanks for the help.</p>
<p>Add <code>AddType application/x-httpd-php .php</code> to your httpd.conf file if you are using Apache 2.4</p>
